titleStmt.title: A proclamation published by the Lords justices and councell of Ireland, to annull and make void all protections unduly granted to the rebels by certaine commissioners in divers counties in Vlster, &c. contrary to their instructions and the intention of the state.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Dublin by William Bladen, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and now reprinted at London for Edward Husbands,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and now
